content: आवश्यक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [अवश्य-वुञ्] Inevitable, necessary; एतेष्वावश्यकस्त्वसौ <ls>Bhāṣā P. 22</ls>, <ls n="Bhāṣā P.">20.</ls> --कं {@--1@} Necessity, inevitable act or duty. °कृ to do what nature compels one to do; <ls>Ms. 4. 93.</ls> {@--2@} An inevitable conclusion.
